programme.desc: Program yang membahas seluk beluk museum-museum ternama di Jakarta, mulai dari sejarah hingga aktivitas museum saat ini.

programme.desc: Program kuliner yang mendemonstrasikan proses mengolah Cokelat dan Keju

programme.title: Amazing Design & Architecture
programme.desc: Program magazine yang membahas tentang berbagai konsep arsitektural dari rumah atau gedung, serta design interior yang menarik, dan juga tips & tricks membuat furniture sendiri. Sehingga bisa jadi inspirasi bagi pemirsa yang sedang membangun rumah atau in

programme.desc: Program feature bertemakan arsitektur yang membahas bangunan-bangunan dengan desain unik namun memiliki ruang yang terbatas.

programme.title: The Hobbies
programme.desc: Program The Hobbies yang dipandu oleh Kresna Julio mengajak pemirsa untuk melihat berbagai macam hobi unik yang menarik dan bisa menjadi sebuah inspirasi bagi pemirsa dimana hobi juga ternyata bisa menjadi sumber penghasilan.

programme.title: Regular Show

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: When Ben grows impatient with the snail-like pace of gardening, he goes O-E Overflow to pick up the pace and accidentally floods the community garden, but once a giant sink hole appears and frees King Koil and his Kimodo Dragon from below, Ben must quickly right his wrong and capture the baddies if he is to save the coastal city of Bayburgh.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Chowder must make a delivery to the scariest house in Marzipan City.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects.

In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Around China

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Battle at Lake Changjin II
programme.desc: In this second battle of the war against US aggression and to aid Korea, the 7th Infantry Company is tasked to attack the Water Gate Bridge. Facing extreme weather conditions, the 7th Company risk their lives to successfully destroy the Water Gate Bridge, thereby blocking the US army’s retreat to Xingnan Port.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Battle at Lake Changjin II
programme.desc: In this second battle of the war against US aggression and to aid Korea, the 7th Infantry Company is tasked to attack the Water Gate Bridge. Facing extreme weather conditions, the 7th Company risk their lives to successfully destroy the Water Gate Bridge, thereby blocking the US army’s retreat to Xingnan Port.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderella’s adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.desc: Assignment Asia is a current affairs program that takes an in-depth look at stories from all over Asia. The show focuses on people. It puts the spotlight on issues affecting the region through interviews with and first-person accounts of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving CGTN a competitive edge in the North American media market.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today

Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: Eco India
programme.desc: From technology to stop onions from spoiling in India's warehouses to agri-tech that connects farmers with customers - we look at ways technology is helping to revolutionize food production.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: An estimated ten trillion insects and spiders live on Earth. And they all reproduce. But how? Now, researchers are studying how bugs have sex. The conclusion, so far? It's complicated!

programme.title: Close up
programme.desc: The weekly half-hour program delivers in-depth reporting on topical political issues and newsworthy events. Revealing the story behind the stories, "Close up" is informative, gripping and visually powerful.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Naomi Leshongoro and Pauline Leriong are Kenya's first elephant nannies. At the Reteti Elephant Sanctuary, the two women take in sick and orphaned elephant calves. They care for the baby elephants, then release them back into their natural habitat.

programme.title: Eco Africa
programme.desc: Coastal communities in The Gambia are struggling not only with the effects of overfishing but also pollution. Protecting Guinea's Tristao Islands, Tunisian olive farming in crisis, an eco hospital in Ghana and a Masai wildlife photographer.

programme.title: Eco India
programme.desc: From technology to stop onions from spoiling in India's warehouses to agri-tech that connects farmers with customers - we look at ways technology is helping to revolutionize food production.

programme.desc: The weekly half-hour program delivers in-depth reporting on topical political issues and newsworthy events. Revealing the story behind the stories, "Close up" is informative, gripping and visually powerful.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Pandemics, wars and natural disasters jeopardize trade and supply chain security. Even in the best of times, international supply chains often lack the necessary transparency, especially when it comes to poor working and environmental conditions.

programme.title: In Good Shape
programme.desc: Alcohol, sugar, drugs, video games: in many societies, they’re sources of pleasure. But when does that pleasure turn into addiction? All that and more in this edition of In Good Shape.

programme.desc: GHOSTS is a comedy about Samantha and Jay who decided to convert a huge estate they inherited into a bed & breakfast - only to find it's inhabited by the many spirits who now call it home.

programme.title: Sunan Gunung Jati
programme.desc: Kisah Sunan Gunung Jati yang berusaha menyiarkan Islam di Cirebon dengan menunjukkan kemampuannya agar orang percaya akan adanya Allah. Ia juga berusaha melawan kedigdayaan raja Cakraningrat dengan tidak mau membayar upeti lagi. Karena Cakraningrat sulit ditaklukan dalam perang, maka ia menyuruh anaknya untuk mencuri jimat Cakraningrat.

programme.title: Toilet 105
programme.desc: Toilet yang dimiliki oleh SMU Bina Persada selalu wangi dan bersih, hingga jadi favorit tak hanya siswa-siwa tapi juga 'penghuni' lainnya, makhluk halus. Okta, Ical, dan Rio adalah siswa yang selalu mendapat teror dari 'penghuni' toilet itu.

programme.title: Bidadari Pulau Hantu
programme.desc: Evan dan Gesti melakukan pemotretan pre-wedding di pulau yang dikenal sebagai pulau hantu. Pulau ini terkenal dengan sosok hantu perempuan yang membawa celurit dan menggunakan gaun pengantin. Pasangan ini mengajak Remon seorang fotografer, Remi, pria penata rias kemayu, Vidi, sepupu Gesti, dan Tilda. Di hari pertama pemotretan, hantu perempuan bergaun pengantin sudah menteror rombongan Evan dan Gesti

programme.title: Lutung Kasarung
programme.desc: Karena menginginkan istri yang secantik ibunya, maka guru Minda dikutuk oleh ibunya sendiri menjadi Lutung Kasarung. yang akan berubah menjadi manusia lagi, ketika ada wanita yang mencintainya

programme.title: Jones: Jomblo Ngenes
programme.desc: Noval jatuh cinta saat bertemu Astika. Tapi di antara suka dan bahagia, ada pula rasa sakit. Noval berkali-kali terjerumus di situasi di mana Astika memperdayainya. Astika meminta Noval berbuat dan berkata aneh-aneh di berbagai situasi menggelikan. Noval bisa saja menjauh, tapi pesona Atika membuatnya tak bisa meninggalkannya.

programme.title: Melodi Cinta Rhoma Irama
programme.desc: Rhoma jatuh cinta dengan Ricca dan sempat merencanakan pernikahan. Namun jalinan cinta mereka diganggu oleh Herman yang juga mencintai Ricca dan ingin menguasai harta ayah Ricca

programme.title: Baby Blues
programme.desc: Sepasang suami-istri, Andika dan Dinda tidak menyangka bahwa merawat bayi tidak semudah yang dibayangkan. Hal ini membuat Dinda mengalami sindrom baby blues yang kemudian memicu perdebatan dan pertengkaran.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 2
programme.desc: Setelah peristiwa dalam film sebelumnya, Sam (Julie Estelle) sudah putus dengan Agung dan saat ini berada dalam dilema dalam memperjuangkan jati dirinya dari sisi gelapnya yang semakin kuat kendati adanya wangsit Kuntilanak.

programme.title: Video Maut
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang Doni yang memiliki keinginan untuk membuat video mesum dengan kekasihnya Maya di sebuah villa. Maya merupakan gadis lugu yang dikerjai oleh Doni. Di villa itu maya tidak sendiri namun mengajak temanya dan membuat rencana Doni berantakan, akhirnya ia membuat rencana agar teman-teman maya pergi dan melancarkan aksinya. Saat Doni merayu Maya dan memulai membuat video munculah sosok menyeramkan. Doni dan maya akhirnya gila. Video itu tersebar di dunia maya, dan barang siapa yang menontonya akan mati dibunuh oleh sosok menyeramkan di video itu.

programme.title: Cowok Bikin Pusing
programme.desc: 3 sahabat sejati yang selalu mendukung untuk semua hal, termasuk kisah sakit hati dengan makhluk yang namanya Cowok.

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Cindy, cewek trendi yang benar-benar memenangkan mobil mewah dari undian tutup botol, mati-matian berusaha membatalkan nazar asal-asalannya.

programme.title: Maju Kena Mundur Kena Returns
programme.desc: Berkisah Trio WOW: Wira, Ozie dan Wulu yang tertantang menyelinap masuk ke asrama cewek-cewek cantik yang berdekatan dengan mini market tempat kerja mereka. Supaya bisa masuk Wira pura-pura impoten, Ojie pura-pura buta, sedangkan Wulu menyelinap ke asrama seperti maling.

programme.title: Obama Anak Menteng
programme.desc: Barry Obama berusia 9 tahun ketika tiba di Menteng. Sebagai anak baru dengan latar belakang campur aduk membuatnya sulit beradaptasi. Persahabatannya dengan anak-anak tetangga, berbeda strata sosial yaitu Slamet dan Yuniardi, serta pembantunya yang banci, Turdi, membawa Barry ke berbagai pengalaman

programme.title: Aach...Aku Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang kisah pasangan kekasih Yulia dan Rumi yang tumbuh bersama sejak kecil. Namun keadaan berubah ketika orang tua Rumi usahanya bangkrut dan Rumi meningalkan Yulia. Suatu saat mereka ditemukan kembali, namun dengan perasaan yang bimbang karena masing-masing sudah mempunyai calon pasangan hidupnya.

Menceritakan tentang rumah yang baru ditempati oleh Kevin dan Nayla. Mereka bertetangga oleh Julian, Dita dan anaknya Lila. Namun ternyata rumah mereka berpenghuni mahluk halus yang selalu meneror keluarga-nya. Kejadian fatal yang membuat Nayla membunuh Kevin adalah ketika Nayla diperkosa oleh mahluk halus yang menyerupai Kevin hingga Nayla hamil.

programme.title: Menggapai Matahari
programme.desc: Mobil yang dikendarai Tika, kekasih Rhoma Irama, menabrak Selvy hingga tewas. Rhoma Irama mengaku sebagai pengendara mobil tersebut untuk meyelamatkan kekasihnya dari penjara. Indra, kekasih Selvy, berusaha merebut Tika dari Rhoma Irama, sedangkan Beny Compo, kakak Selvy, berusaha menghancurkan karir musik Rhoma Irama sebagai pelampiasan dendam

programme.title: Rumah Hantu Pasar Malam
programme.desc: Misteri pembunuhan terjadi di pasar malam desa Sumber Sari. Namun daya tarik pasar malam tersebut seakan tidak pernah berhenti menarik pengunjungnya, termasuk kelima sahabat yang sedang mengunjungi desa tersebut. Teror pun kemudian kembali terjadi. Satu persatu korban berjatuhan dan mengancam nyawa kelima sahabat tersebut.

programme.title: Kesurupan Jumat Kliwon
programme.desc: Menceritakan keempat pemuda yang memutuskan untuk bunuh diri karena berbagai masalah. Sebelum bunuh diri, mereka berlibur di rumah tua dekat pantai, yang dimana rumah itu terkenal angker. Terror kepada mereka pun terus berlanjut dihari pertama yaitu malam jumat kliwon.

programme.title: Petualangan 100 Jam
programme.desc: Budiman yang berusia 10 tahun hendak berpetualang dari desanya di Muntilan ke Jakarta. Selama perjalanan tersebut Budiman mengalami banyak hal yang belum pernah dialaminya.

programme.title: Hattrick
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang turnamen futsal internasional. Kebetulan tahun ini diadakan di Indonesia, maka dicarilah pemain-pemain terbaik dari seulurh Indonesia untuk dididik dan diikutkan dalam turnamen ini.

programme.title: Hijab
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keempat sahabat Anin, Bia,Tata dan Sari. Mereka mempunyai gaya berpenampilan berbeda-beda kecuali Anin yang tidak memakai Hijab. Kegalauan mereka semakin meningkat karena mereka berhijab dan mendapatkan uang dari "Ikut Suami". Namun hal itu dibantah dengan mereka membangun bisnis Hijab dan berhasil. Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

programme.title: Laundry Show
programme.desc: Kisah bermula tentang seoranng pemuda, Kokoh, yang memilih keluar dari kantornya untuk mendirikan sebuah usaha binatu. Di awal perjalanan usahanya, dia harus berhadapan dengan pegawai yang punya berbagai kepribadian jenaka nan konyol. Akan tetapi, tantangan terbesarnya lewat persaingan dari Agustina yang juga mendirikan usaha binatu.

programme.title: Bila Hati Perempuan Menjerit
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Indahsari yang selalu menjadi ratu batik tiga tahun berturut-turut tidak tahu bahwa masalah menghampirinya saat ia berkenalan dengan Boy. Saking tergila-gilanya akan Indah, Boy yang selalu berusaha mendekati Indah yang sudah akan menikah, nekat memperkosa Indah. Saat dinyatakan tidak bersalah, Indah melakukan main hakim sendiri, karena ternyata Boy juga memperkosa adiknya, Astri.

programme.title: Arie Hanggara
programme.desc: Kisah nyata setelah warga Jakarta dihebohkan kasus meninggalnya seorang bocah 8 tahun bernama Arie Hanggara akibat penyiksaan orang tuanya.

programme.title: Cewek Gokil
programme.desc: Keke bukan sembarang anak perempuan, kepalanya penuh dengan cita-cita dan keinginan. Impian Keke yang semakin dekat, tapi suatu kejadian memaksa Keke untuk merelakan mimpi yang sudah diraihnya itu

programme.title: Ratu Kostmopolitan
programme.desc: Tiga cewek cantik dan bokek mau tidak mau harus jumpalitan, putar otak, dan baca mantra buat mengusir preman yang mau menggusur rumah kost mereka. Sambil rebutan cowok, pula!

programme.title: Suami-Suami Takut Istri
programme.desc: Demi mengabulkan permintaan para istri yang meminta berbulan madu ke Bali, para suami pun mengajak para istri ke Bali. Walaupun sebenarnya ada maksud lain dibalik kebaikan para suami. Mereka berencana untuk menghadiri pertunjukan super sexy dari Trio Ganas. Namun akhirnya para istri mengetahui adanya rencana lain dari para suami.

programme.title: Kalung Jelangkung
programme.desc: Berniat mengisi liburan dengan pergi ke sebuah kampung, Kiki dengan teman-temannya justru mendapatkan musibah setelah merka iseng bermain jailangkung. Sepulang dari kampung tersebut, Kiki yang menemukan kalung diatas sebuah kuburan dan mengambilnya, mengalami kejadian-kejadian aneh, hingga ia sakit.

programme.title: 3 Srikandi
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang 3 altlet panahan putri yang akan bersaing di olimpiade di Soul. Namun krisis pelatih yang dialami mengharuskan Donald kembali melatih timnas Indonesia untuk bertanding setelah pensiun. Kerja keras dan disiplin Donald diterapkan kepada ketiga atlet perempuan panahan itu. Hingga mereka siap diberangkatkan ke Seoul.

programme.title: Pulau Hantu
programme.desc: Delapan sahabat hendak pergi berlibur, namun kapal pesiar yang mereka tumpangi harus berbelok arah dan menurunkan mereka di sebuah pulau kecil yang indah. Namun, di balik keindahan pulau tersebut, terdapat rahasia yang membawa maut

programme.title: Menggapai Matahari Ii
programme.desc: Kelanjutan dari cerita Menggapai Matahri. Persaingan antara Rhoma Irama dan Beny Compo terus berlanjut. Beny Compo tak hanya ingin menghancurkan karir musik Rhoma Irama, tapi juga ingin mencelakainya secara fisik.

Menceritakan tentang rumah yang baru ditempati oleh Kevin dan Nayla. Mereka bertetangga oleh Julian, Dita dan anaknya Lila. Namun ternyata rumah mereka berpenghuni mahluk halus yang selalu meneror keluarga-nya. Kejadian fatal yang membuat Nayla membunuh Kevin adalah ketika Nayla diperkosa oleh mahluk halus yang menyerupai Kevin hingga Nayla hamil.

programme.title: Cintaku Di Kampus Biru
programme.desc: Anton, mahasiswa cerdas, aktivis, ganteng, dan seolah penakluk wanita. Ia menghadapi masalah lain: seorang dosen yang dianggap menghambat mahasiswa, Yusnita. Anton berusaha menaklukkan Yusnita untuk mengatasi masalahnya

programme.title: Ponirah Terpidana
programme.desc: Sedari kecil, Ponirah dianggap membawa kesialan bagi orang sekitarnya. Ibunya meninggal ketika melahirkannya. Lalu sang kakak meninggal saat memboncenginya naik sepeda. Lalu ia dibawa kabur oleh pelayannya yang setia, diselamatkan dari amukan ayahnya yang kalap ingin membunuhnya. Ketika dewasa, ia tergoda oleh rayuan seorang calo pencari wanita muda untuk dijadikan wanita penghibur di Jakarta. Ponirah pun bertekad menjadi wanita penghibur termahal.

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Cindy, cewek trendi yang benar-benar memenangkan mobil mewah dari undian tutup botol, mati-matian berusaha membatalkan nazar asal-asalannya.

programme.title: Maju Kena Mundur Kena Returns
programme.desc: Berkisah Trio WOW: Wira, Ozie dan Wulu yang tertantang menyelinap masuk ke asrama cewek-cewek cantik yang berdekatan dengan mini market tempat kerja mereka. Supaya bisa masuk Wira pura-pura impoten, Ojie pura-pura buta, sedangkan Wulu menyelinap ke asrama seperti maling.

programme.title: Obama Anak Menteng
programme.desc: Barry Obama berusia 9 tahun ketika tiba di Menteng. Sebagai anak baru dengan latar belakang campur aduk membuatnya sulit beradaptasi. Persahabatannya dengan anak-anak tetangga, berbeda strata sosial yaitu Slamet dan Yuniardi, serta pembantunya yang banci, Turdi, membawa Barry ke berbagai pengalaman

programme.title: Aach...Aku Jatuh Cinta
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang kisah pasangan kekasih Yulia dan Rumi yang tumbuh bersama sejak kecil. Namun keadaan berubah ketika orang tua Rumi usahanya bangkrut dan Rumi meningalkan Yulia. Suatu saat mereka ditemukan kembali, namun dengan perasaan yang bimbang karena masing-masing sudah mempunyai calon pasangan hidupnya.

programme.title: Baby Blues
programme.desc: Sepasang suami-istri, Andika dan Dinda tidak menyangka bahwa merawat bayi tidak semudah yang dibayangkan. Hal ini membuat Dinda mengalami sindrom baby blues yang kemudian memicu perdebatan dan pertengkaran.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 2
programme.desc: Setelah peristiwa dalam film sebelumnya, Sam (Julie Estelle) sudah putus dengan Agung dan saat ini berada dalam dilema dalam memperjuangkan jati dirinya dari sisi gelapnya yang semakin kuat kendati adanya wangsit Kuntilanak.

programme.title: Video Maut
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang Doni yang memiliki keinginan untuk membuat video mesum dengan kekasihnya Maya di sebuah villa. Maya merupakan gadis lugu yang dikerjai oleh Doni. Di villa itu maya tidak sendiri namun mengajak temanya dan membuat rencana Doni berantakan, akhirnya ia membuat rencana agar teman-teman maya pergi dan melancarkan aksinya. Saat Doni merayu Maya dan memulai membuat video munculah sosok menyeramkan. Doni dan maya akhirnya gila. Video itu tersebar di dunia maya, dan barang siapa yang menontonya akan mati dibunuh oleh sosok menyeramkan di video itu.

programme.title: Cowok Bikin Pusing
programme.desc: 3 sahabat sejati yang selalu mendukung untuk semua hal, termasuk kisah sakit hati dengan makhluk yang namanya Cowok.

programme.title: Daerah Terlarang
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang sekelompok publik figur yang mendapatkan teror hantu pocong pada saat menggarap syuting film horror. Teror dimulai saat mereka tidak sengaja bertemu dengan sosok pocong di sebuah rumah angker. menurut penduduk Sosok pocong tersebut adalah kembang desa yang di bunuh. Teror pun terus berlanjut dan kejadian-kejadian aneh pun terjadi pada saat syuting.

programme.title: Mati Muda Di Pelukan Janda
programme.desc: Rahmat yang sejak kecil sudah ditinggal mati oleh kedua orang tuanya, tumbuh besar diasuh oleh seorang pemilik salon, mbak Bunga atau mas Bambang. Tempat tinggalnya berhadapan langsung dengan rumah yang ditempati oleh seorang janda, Ratih, yang sudah menjada selama 2 tahun. Rahmat pun menaruh hati pada Ratih. Namun ada janda lain yang menyukai Rahmat dan membenci Ratih, Mpok Sari, yang selalu membuat onar agar para warga memusuhi Ratih.

programme.title: Pulau Hantu 2
programme.desc: Merupakan kelanjutan dari "Pulau Hantu" yang pertama. Dante, kembali harus terperangkap di pulau hantu dan harus menyelamatkan diri dari sesosok arwah penasaran yang mengejarnya dan juga temannya. Keadaan tambah kacau ketika pulau tersebut didatangi anak-anak muda yang ingin membuat pesta, dan diperparah dengan tewasnya sang dukun yang bertugas mengamankan suasana.

programme.title: Mega Film Asia
programme.desc: Mega Film Asia Adalah Program Yang Memutarkan Film-Film Asia Yang Ditayangkan Di Indosiar. Acara Ini Ditayangkan Perdana Pada Tahun 1996 Silam.

programme.title: Mega Film Asia
programme.desc: Mega Film Asia Adalah Program Yang Memutarkan Film-Film Asia Yang Ditayangkan Di Indosiar. Acara Ini Ditayangkan Perdana Pada Tahun 1996 Silam.

programme.desc: Pembawa acara menjelaskan berbagai manfaat dari produk-produk pengobatan herbal yang dapat digunakan untuk melangsingkan tubuh, serta memberikan sederet penawaran menarik.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman,” the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: How To Buy A Friend
programme.desc: A boy having little presence writes a poem. A girl who went missing without a reason a year ago. However, the secret of death has been lying in that poem. This is a story of an adventure of a boy and him tracing the secrets.

programme.title: School 2017
programme.desc: 'School,' the hugely popular series, is back for 2017! The drama highlights a variety of important issues facing South Korea's teenagers.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge

programme.title: Suits
programme.desc: A capable and distinguished lawyer of the law firm "Kang & Ham" Choi Kang-Seok recruits a young man named Go Yeon-Woo who has a retentive memory but not a law degree. An adaptation from the American TV show Suits.

programme.title: Gunman in Joseon
programme.desc: In the time of enlightenment, a battle between a sword and a gun has started. Based in the time of enlightenment of 19th-century Joseon, "Gunman in Joseon" tells the story of Joseon's last swordsman named Park Yoon Kang who grabs a gun ditching his sword and grows to become the era's hero.

programme.desc: Eri (Kuninaka Ryoko), from Kohama island, Okinawa, moves to Tokyo to become a nurse while cherishing a childhood promise of marriage with Fumiya (Kohashi Kenji). Amid a life filled with hard work and joy, holding onto her grandmother's saying, ‘Life is the greatest treasure,’ Eri brings the “moisture of the southern islands” to people's hearts.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "Me and Future Me !?" Eps. 13
programme.desc: Igarashi Raito (Tsuna Keito), a municipal worker for 10 years, has lived a stable life under constant pressure to avoid making mistakes in a society where a misstep could trigger a public backlash. One day, a man claiming to be Raito himself and saying he has come from the future, suddenly appears. The man predicts events in Raito’s future one after another?his dreams, work, friendships, relationships, marriage, and family. Raito’s stable daily life begins to waver under the influence of the man’s bold behavior and different values.

programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.desc: From Phoenix to the World, is a news program where reporters from around the world interact directly with the anchors through satellite and telephone lines to put audiences in touch with important events right form where they happen.

programme.title: Phoenix Panorama
programme.desc: PHOENIX PANORAMA :To entertain, educate and inform audiences, Panoramic Eyeshot of Phoenix, a series of captivating and controversial documentaries, includes segments on current affairs, historical anniversaries and exclusive insider views on present developments.

programme.title: News On The Hour

programme.title: Zoom In

programme.title: Summary Of Press

programme.title: Phoenix Midday Express

programme.title: Chief Editor'S Time

programme.title: China Insight
programme.desc: CHINA INSIGHT:The newly launched observation documentary program. Each issue takes a foreigner as the protagonist, travels all over China and observes China's social conditions and Chinese people's life from a close perspective.

programme.title: Fact Check On News
programme.desc: FACT CHECK ON NEWS: Capture false news, trace the source of resources and the publisher, investigate the background and credibility of the publisher, and verify the information content and release motivation. Crack the false reports in the news and restore the truth of news events.

programme.title: The Great Era

programme.title: Hong Kong Hot Kitchen
programme.desc: "Hong Kong Hot Kitchen" is an upgraded version of Phoenix TV Chinese Channel's "HK Core Talk ". The senior commentator Mr. Gary Cheng invites Hong Kong's political and economic circle to gather in the hot kitchen, using current events as ingredients, using this as a metaphor, knowing from the smallest details, and using creativity as cooking skills. programme.title: Soap: Il Paradiso delle Signore 8 Daily
Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Terang Kasih
programme.desc: Siraman rohani Kristen yang berkaitan dengan kehidupan untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Tuhan Yesus Kristus. Program ini akan dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian, antara lain kesaksian, renungan, serta konseling yang akan dipandu oleh dua orang host

programme.title: STB (Sangat Tidak Biasa)
programme.desc: Program ini menghadirkan kompilasi informasi berbagai macam issue dan topik yang akan dibahas dari berbagai sisi dan dipaparkan oleh penyulih suara.

programme.title: Seru! (Semua Harus Tau)
programme.desc: Program informasi dokumenter yang menyajikan berbagai informasi disertai dengan pemaparannya. Program ini membahas berbagai hal yang seru dan unik yang dilihat dari berbagai sisi serta dipaparkan oleh VO (Voice Over). Selain menghibur, program ini juga kaya akan pengetahuan sehingga akan menambah banyak wawasan bagi pemirsa.

programme.title: Buka Mata Buka Hati
programme.desc: Program Religi

programme.title: Kumprank
programme.desc: Sebuah program reality komedi berisi kumpulan prank yang dilakukan oleh "Agen Prank" di tempat umum kepada "Target Pank" yang disertai dengan komentar spontan dari Nikta Gina dan suami (Kinos) sehingga menambah kelucuan.

programme.title: Mina Mila
programme.desc: Serial animasi religi islami yang menceritakan kehidupan sehari-hari antara dua anak kembar Mina dan Mila. Program ini akan mengajak penonton untuk belajar, melakukan hal-hal baik, bermain, serta bernyanyi bersama.

programme.title: Ibra Berkisah
programme.desc: Ibrahim atau Ibra adalah murid pesantren yang santun dan selalu mengajak teman-temannya untuk meneladani Nabi Muhammad SAW, dia pun sejak kecil sudah tinggal di pesantren. Ibra memiliki teman bernama Tokek dan Hoho. Tokek adalah anak yang lucu dan periang, sedangkan Hoho adalah seorang anak Jakarta yang dilahirkan dari keluarga kaya raya, sifatnya manja dan tidak mengerti sama sekali tentang islam. Selama di Pesantren, Hoho sekamar dengan Ibra yang mana di perkenalan awal mereka, Hoho menganggap remeh Ibra yang dia anggap sebagai anak kampung. Tapi ternyata dari Ibra lah Hoho banyak mendapatkan pelajaran hidup dan kisah-kisah teladan Nabi Muhammad Shalallahu Alaihi Wassalam.

programme.title: Lensa Indonesia Pagi
programme.desc: Program berita yang menghadirkan informasi terkini, rangkuman peristiwa yang terjadi dari malam hingga dini hari dengan dua segmen khusus, yaitu Lensa Dunia dan Lensa Arena yang membahas berbagai informasi olahraga di Indonesia maupun mancanegara

programme.title: Riko The Series
programme.desc: Animasi lokal yang mengangkat keseharian seorang anak bernama Riko bersama sahabat robotnya, Q110 untuk menemukan dan mempelajari hal-hal baru disekitarnya. Q110 bertugas menjelaskan kepada Riko hal-hal baru yang mereka temukan. Berkat Q110, Riko mempelajari banyak pengetahuan soal ilmuan-ilmuan muslim dari penjuru dunia, kekuasaan Allah sang Maha Pencipta, dan tentunya banyak hal lainya.

programme.title: Smurfs
programme.desc: Di tengah hutan belantara, terdapat desa rahasia dihuni oleh sekelompok makhluk kecil berwarna biru yang dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf. Para Smurf tinggal di rumah berbentuk jamur dan hidup dengan damai. Ada beberapa karakter smurf lain nya seperti Wild Smurf yang memiliki sifat yang nakal dan memiliki hubungan yang kuat dengan kehidupan hewan, juga temperamen tetapi dia memiliki cara yang aneh terhadap rutinitas harian Smurf berbeda dengan para Smurf lainnya. Karakter lainnya yaitu Leaf, seorang peri alam yang ditakdirkan untuk menggantikan Mother Nature (pada musim pertama) yang belum memiliki kendali penuh atas kekuatannya.

programme.title: Si Aa
programme.desc: Animasi lokal dengan tokoh utama bernama Rafathar Malik Ahmad, seorang anak laki-laki dari pasangan publik figure Raffi Ahmad & Nagita Slavina. Program ini menceritakan tentang keseharian Rafathar bersama keluarganya di komplek Andarans. Setiap kisahnya dibalut dengan cerita yang ringan dengan gaya slapstik. Setiap episodenya terdapat tokoh-tokoh fiktif yang karakternya dekat dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Adit Sopo Jarwo
programme.desc: Animasi Indonesia, berisikan kisah kehidupan sehari-hari masyarakat Indonesia yang dipenuhi dengan pengetahuan, kelucuan, kisah persahabatan, serta nilai persatuan, kesatuan, dan kebudayaan. Tokoh dalam cerita ini diantaranya Adit (tokoh utama, seorang anak laki-laki), Adelya (adik Adit), teman-teman Adit yakni Dennis, Mitha, dan Devi. Mereka harus berhadapan dengan duo orang dewasa (Sopo & Jarwo) yang selalu mencari celah untuk mendapat keuntungan tanpa usaha. Perbedaan paham atau cara pandang merupakan bumbu utama yang memicu “perseteruan” dan "kelucuan". Beruntung di antara mereka ada H. Udin, ketua RW bijaksana yang selalu menjadi penengah dan memberikan petuah bijak yang disampaikan dengan ringan serta lugas sehingga mampu mengembalikan suasana gaduh menjadi teduh.

programme.title: Go Go Bus
programme.desc: Serial kartun klasik yang menampilkan makhluk ajaib seperti peri biru yang disebut Smurf. Keluarga Smurf, dinamai berdasarkan kepribadian mereka, mendiami sebuah desa rumah jamur di hutan yang mempesona. Makhluk yang menyenangkan ini dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf dan hidup tanpa beban tanpa terkecuali satu ancaman besar terhadap keberadaan mereka yaitu Gargamel, seorang penyihir jahat tapi tidak kompeten yang tinggal di sebuah rumah yang dibangun dari batu di hutan; dan teman kucingnya, Azrael yang sama jahatnya. Cerita khas berurusan dengan upaya Smurf untuk melawan Gargamel, yang ingin melakukan salah satu dari beberapa hal pada makhluk biru termasuk memakannya, menjadikan mereka budak dan mendapatkan rahasia magis mereka untuk mendapatkan martabat di antara persaudaraan penyihir. Lebih dari sekali, Smurf harus menyelamatkan Gargamel dari rencana penembakan baliknya atau bahkan penyihir jahat.

programme.title: The Smurfs Classic
programme.desc: Serial kartun klasik yang menampilkan makhluk ajaib seperti peri biru yang disebut Smurf. Keluarga Smurf, dinamai berdasarkan kepribadian mereka, mendiami sebuah desa rumah jamur di hutan yang mempesona. Makhluk yang menyenangkan ini dipimpin oleh Papa Smurf dan hidup tanpa beban tanpa terkecuali satu ancaman besar terhadap keberadaan mereka yaitu Gargamel, seorang penyihir jahat tapi tidak kompeten yang tinggal di sebuah rumah yang dibangun dari batu di hutan; dan teman kucingnya, Azrael yang sama jahatnya. Cerita khas berurusan dengan upaya Smurf untuk melawan Gargamel, yang ingin melakukan salah satu dari beberapa hal pada makhluk biru termasuk memakannya, menjadikan mereka budak dan mendapatkan rahasia magis mereka untuk mendapatkan martabat di antara persaudaraan penyihir. Lebih dari sekali, Smurf harus menyelamatkan Gargamel dari rencana penembakan baliknya atau bahkan penyihir jahat.

programme.title: Pokemon Ultimate Journeys
programme.desc: Tantangannya semakin besar bagi Ash, Goh, dan Chloe saat mereka maju menuju tujuan mereka! Saat turnamen Pokémon World Coronation Series semakin memanas, pelatihan intensif disiapkan untuk Ash, Pikachu, dan teman-teman Pokémon mereka. Sementara itu, Goh memulai serangkaian misi percobaan yang menantang untuk menjadi anggota Project Mew. Kemudian saat Chloe dan Eevee mempelajari berbagai jalur evolusi yang dapat diambil Eevee, akankah mereka dapat mengambil keputusan tentang masa depannya?

programme.title: Boboiboy
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang mengisahkan Boboiboy dan teman-temannya yakni Gopal, Ying, dan Yaya yang masing-masing memiliki kekuatan super. Dengan kekuatan yang dimiliki mereka mencegah Adu Du mencuri biji kakao Tok Aba yang digunakan sebagai sumber energi. Selain itu, Boboiboy dan teman-temannya menjadi pahlawan super dalam menumpas kejahatan dan menjaga kedamaian Bumi.

programme.title: Tawa Satwa
programme.desc: Program yang menampilkan kompilasi video lucu hewan yang viral di media sosial dan di-react secara kekinian oleh voice over talent dengan karakter beragam yang akan menambah kelucuan.

programme.title: Boba (Bombastis Banget)
programme.desc: BOBA (BOMBASTIS BANGET) merupakan program yang berisi informasi ringan yang menyajikan video-video bombastis yang viral, lucu, dan unik dari sosial media. Bisa berupa video kejadian yang tidak biasa ataupun video yang sedang viral. Video-video tersebut akan dikomentari dengan menggunakan VO (voice over) dan dikemas dengan editing yang kekinian.

programme.title: Kokom (Kompilasi Komedi)
programme.desc: Program yang berisikan kompilasi video-video lucu yang viral di sosial media.

programme.title: Lego Ninjago Dragon Rising
programme.desc: Tantangan baru yang menegangkan sudah didepan mata, dan dari wajah yang tampak sangat familiar. Para ninja menghadapi tantangan kejahatan yang belum pernah ada sebelumnya. Sebuah ritual misterius mengancam untuk membangkitkan kembali “Lima Terlarang” dan teknik bertarung yang “terlupakan” dan rusak telah muncul. Imperium mungkin telah runtuh tetapi rencana jahat Lord Ras masih jauh dari selesai! Rahasia terlarang, kekuatan gelap dari zaman yang hilang, dan “bulan darah” yang misterius. Bisakah para ninja menguasai teknik mereka sebelum “Bulan Darah” terbit?

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Serial animasi dengan tokoh utama bernama Ali yang tidak sengaja menjadi agen Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA). Ali membuktikan diri bahwa Ia mampu menjadi agen MATA dan mengalahkan musuh bersama Alicia dan Paman bakar

programme.title: Boboiboy Galaxy The Movie
programme.desc: BoBoiBoy Galaxy merupakan sebuah kisah tentang robot-robot Power Sphera yang dibuat untuk memberikan kekuasaan besar kepada pemiliknya. Namun, proyek Power Sphera akhirnya dianggap sebagai proyek yang berbahaya dan dibatalkan, sedangkan Power Sphera yang lain melarikan diri dan bersembunyi di berbagai pelosok galaksi.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Sebuah program animasi yang menceritakan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Amato dalam menemukan sebuah pesawat ruang angkasa penjara berisi robot-robot jahat yang telah jatuh ke bumi. Salah satu robot tersebut adalah MechaBot yang memiliki kemampuan untuk mengubah objek sehari-hari menjadi perangkat berteknologi tinggi. Amato berhasil menginovasi MechaBot menjadi master MechaBot. Sejak itu, MechaBot dan Amato mulai bekerja sama untuk menemukan dan menangkap robot jahat.

programme.title: Si Paling Trending!
programme.desc: Program TV berjenis informasi documentary yang mengangkat suatu hal atau issue yang sedang trending, dibahas dari berbagai sisi, dan dipaparkan oleh VO ( Voice Over ). Setiap segmen menampilkan fakta terunik, asal usul, fenomena yang trending.

programme.title: Terkepo-Kepo
programme.desc: Program informasi dokumenter, menyajikan berbagai informasi yang dekat dengan kehidupan sehari-hari dan dibahas dari berbagai sudut pandang disertai dengan pemaparannya. Selain menghibur, program ini juga kaya akan pengetahuan sehingga akan menambah banyak wawasan bagi pemirsa.

programme.title: Takdir Cinta Kera Sakti
programme.desc: 500 tahun yang lalu, Zi Xia turun ke bumi untuk menemukan Zhi Zun Bao, kekasihnya yang berhasil mengeluarkan pedang Zi Qing. Seiring berjalannya waktu, pedang Zi Qing rusak. Untuk memperbaikinya, Zi Xia menggunakan Kotak Pandora untuk menjelajah waktu, yang membuatnya terjebak di masa 500 tahun mendatang. Di sana ia bertemu Zhi Zun Bao, namun ia samasekali tidak ingat akan masa lalunya. Selain tidak ingat akan masa lalunya, ia sekarang adalah pemimpin kelompok pemberontak Bernama Ax Gang. Cerita berlanjut dengan lebih banyak penjelajahan waktu dan kejadian tak terduga!

programme.title: Catatan Seputar Investigasi
programme.desc: Sebuah program buletin crime news, menyoroti berbagai tindak kriminalitas yang terjadi di tanah air serta memberikan tips-tips untuk menghindari kejahatan.

programme.title: Jagoan Silat
programme.desc: Serial Indonesia yang bercerita mengenai kehidupan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Toyib yang ingin menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Namun, impiannya ditentang oleh ibunya dikarenakan ayahnya Toyib yang seorang jagoan silat dianggap meninggal dengan tidak wajar. Walaupun demikian, tidak membuat Toyib mengurungkan impiannya untuk menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Banyak drama, pesan moral serta hikmah yang dapat diambil pada program ini.

programme.title: Jagoan Silat
programme.desc: Serial Indonesia yang bercerita mengenai kehidupan seorang anak laki-laki bernama Toyib yang ingin menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Namun, impiannya ditentang oleh ibunya dikarenakan ayahnya Toyib yang seorang jagoan silat dianggap meninggal dengan tidak wajar. Walaupun demikian, tidak membuat Toyib mengurungkan impiannya untuk menjadi seorang Jagoan Silat. Banyak drama, pesan moral serta hikmah yang dapat diambil pada program ini.

programme.title: Terang Kasih
programme.desc: Siraman rohani Kristen yang berkaitan dengan kehidupan untuk mendekatkan diri kepada Tuhan Yesus Kristus. Program ini akan dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian, antara lain kesaksian, renungan, serta konseling yang akan dipandu oleh dua orang host
